alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 10 at 9:19PM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 11 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 feet, La Garita Mountains above 10000 feet and Eastern San Juan Mountains above 10000 feet. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft
